colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES PA 'DI NI PHAN YON NI SNYIGS MA'I DUS SEMS CAN LA GNOD PAR SEMS DANG NAD YAMS DAL YAMS 'THOB RTZOD KHA MCHU DANG, ,PHYUGS LA GOD KHA GA-YANG NYAMS DANG KLU GNYAN SA BDAG GI GNOD PA 'BYUNG MI RNAMS TSE THUNG MI PHYUGS BKRA MI SHIS PA SOGS LA BKRA SHIS BRTZEGS PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR 'DI BYAS PA'I MJUG TU GA-YANG @009A *, ,'GUGS BYAS PAS DGOS SO, ,CES PA 'DI NI ^ SH'AKYA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR BA DANG TSE BSOD 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
